entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:22 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
